resumeData.summary: Experienced Software Engineer with 5+ years of expertise in full-stack development, specializing in React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. Proven track record of delivering scalable applications and leading cross-functional teams.

achievements: Architected and implemented microservices architecture reducing deployment time by 40%
Led a team of 5 engineers in delivering a new product feature used by 50,000+ users
Improved application performance by 60% through code optimization and caching strategies
Developed RESTful APIs serving 10,000+ requests per minute
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes
Built responsive front-end components using React and TypeScript

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.name: Open Source CLI Tool
projects.description: Built a command-line tool for developers with 1,000+ GitHub stars
